link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 新增 支持自定义快进和快退的间隔时间
  2. 修复 某些设备上无法正常编辑文件播放列表编辑
  3. 修复 无效速度倍率值可能导致的崩溃
  4. 修复 面包屑路径导航偶尔导致的崩溃
  5. 修复 搜索页中软键盘行为异常
  6. 修复 文件夹页中当文件夹名称冲突导致的若干异常
  7. 修复 默认起始目录可能失效
  8. 修复 横屏下导航栏遮挡内容
  9. 修复 进出转跳瞬间，状态栏闪烁和播放器条随导航栏跳动
  10. 改进 播放列表加载性能
  11. 改进 支持导出包含内部播放列表的数据库
  12. 改进 对路径过滤器设置的编辑器重新设计
  13. 改进 在路径过滤器设置中，支持直接编辑
  14. 改进 支持置顶数据库播放列表
  15. 修改 清空数据库后强制重新启动应用
  16. 翻译 更新 俄语 (Yurt Page), 巴西葡萄牙语 (FalaTudo)
  17. 开发 清理代码, 重构路径过滤器、已收藏歌曲和已置顶播放列表的存储
  18. 开发 更新 Gradle 至 8.14.3, 更新 AGP 至 8.11.1, 更新 Kotlin 至 2.2.10, 更新依赖
  19. 其他 仅上传 sha256 校验和
releaseNote.en:
1. New: support customizing seek internal for forwarding and rewinding
  2. Fix: file playlist editing may not work on some devices
  3. Fix: possibly crash due to invalid speed ratio value
  4. Fix: crash due to the bread crumb in Files in rare circumstance
  5. Fix: various unintended behaviors of soft keyboard in Search
  6. Fix: some issues in Folders due to folder name collision
  7. Fix: default start directory may not work on some circumstances
  8. Fix: navigation bar overlaps content in landscape
  9. Fix: instantly blinking statusbar and fluctuating mini player with navigation bar on entering and transiting
  10. Improve: performance of playlist loading
  11. Improve: support exporting the database of internal playlists
  12. Improve: redesign the editor of Path Filter settings
  13. Improve: support directly editing in Path Filter settings
  14. Improve: support pining database playlists
  15. Modify: force to reboot application after purging the database
  16. Translation: update Russian (by Yurt Page), Brazilian Portuguese (by FalaTudo)
  17. Development: cleanup codes, refactor storage of Path Filter, Favorite Songs and Pinned Playlists
  18. Development: upgrade Gradle to 8.14.3, upgrade AGP to 8.11.1, upgrade Kotlin to 2.2.10, update dependencies
  19. Others: upload only sha256 checksum for release artifacts

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 横屏下导航栏遮挡内容
  2. 修复 进出转跳瞬间，状态栏闪烁和播放器条随导航栏跳动
  3. 修复 横屏下播放器异常 [1.11.0-dev1]

releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: navigation bar overlaps content in landscape
  2. Fix: instantly blinking statusbar and fluctuating mini player with navigation bar on entering and transiting
  3. Fix: broken landscape player [1.11.0-dev1]
  4. Fix: migration of Path Filter, Favorite Songs and Pinned Playlists [1.11.0-dev2]
